# CollisionCastQueryType.nearest

**Case**

Report the closest hit.

## Declaration

```swift
case nearest
```

## Discussion

If you only want to test if a hit occurs and don’t care about which hit out of multiple possible hits is returned, use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionCastQueryType/any] instead because it typically executes faster.

## Collision cast queries

- **CollisionCastQueryType.all**: Report all hits sorted in ascending order by distance from the cast origin.
- **CollisionCastQueryType.any**: Report one hit.

items.description: Report all hits sorted in ascending order by distance from the cast origin.
items.name: CollisionCastQueryType.all

title: CollisionCastQueryType.nearest
